description:
The return of Charlie Cox as Daredevil and Vincent D’Onofrio as Kingpin has prompted many fans to speculate about what other Netflix-era Marvel characters could return. One such Marvel character that fans have been eager to see make a comeback happens to be Krysten Ritter as Jessica Jones, and as shown by her new look, [...]

The post Krysten Ritter Sparks Marvel Return Rumors With New Look appeared first on ScreenGeek.
title: Krysten Ritter Sparks Marvel Return Rumors With New Look

description:
Legendary Hollywood producer Roger Corman has been recognized for decades due to his work on hundreds of different films. Devastatingly, it’s been confirmed that Roger Corman has died at age 98. As shared by Variety, “Corman died May 9 at his home in Santa Monica, Calif., surrounded by family members,” as shared by Corman’s family [...]

The post Legendary Hollywood Producer Roger Corman Dead At 98 appeared first on ScreenGeek.
title: Legendary Hollywood Producer Roger Corman Dead At 98
